{"id":1235372430,"question_id":441,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1713408743,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1235372430/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Arranging Coins","memory":"41 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int arrangeCoins(int n) {\n        long left = 0, right = n;\n        \n        while (left <= right) {\n            long mid = left + (right - left) / 2;\n            long coinsNeeded = (mid * (mid + 1)) / 2;\n            \n            if (coinsNeeded == n) {\n                return (int) mid;\n            } else if (coinsNeeded < n) {\n                left = mid + 1;\n            } else {\n                right = mid - 1;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return (int) right;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"arranging-coins","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
